title: Anke Domscheit-Berg - Wikipedia
snippet: She was a member of the Bundestag from 2017 to 2025. In 2017, she was elected on the party list of The Left, without being a party member. She joined the party in 2021 following her nomination to the top female position on the party election list in the state of Brandenburg.

title: Anke Domscheit-Berg
snippet: She served as a member of the Bundestag for Die Linke from 2017 to 2025, elected initially on the party list without prior membership before formally joining the party.[1] Wait, no wiki, skip that.

title: Anke Domscheit-Berg | The Guardian
snippet: Anke Domscheit-Berg is chairwoman of the State of Brandenburg Pirate Party and a candidate for the Bundestag at the upcoming elections. She is an open government activist, consultant and writer

title: Anke Domscheit-Berg
snippet: Anke Domscheit-Berg (born Anke Domscheit; 17 February 1968) is a German politician and activist. She has been a member of the Bundestag since 2017, when she was elected on the party list of The Left, without being a party member.

title: Anke Domscheit-Berg: German politician (1968-) | Biography, Filmography, Facts, Information, Career, Wiki, Life
snippet: She has been a member of the Bundestag since 2017, when she was elected on the party list of The Left, without being a party member. Previously, she had been a member of the Pirate Party Germany and the Greens.
